content: **crocheted snow-crystal star in drops kid-silk theme christmas ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern ks-204 yarn group a + a ------------------------------------------------------- **size** approx 8½ cm in diameter **yarn** drops kid-silk from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 25 g colour 38 chalk 1 snow-crystal weighs approx 4 g **crochet hook** drops crochet hook size 2 5 mm **crochet gauge** 22 treble crochets in width with 2 strands = 10 cm hook size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger hook size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller hook size
